# thyroid.md

Evidence-based information about thyroid disorders including hypothyroidism, hyperthyroidism, Hashimoto's, and treatment options.

## About This Site

thyroid.md provides clear, medically-reviewed information about thyroid disorders — conditions affecting 20 million Americans, 60% undiagnosed. We explain thyroid function, common disorders (hypothyroidism, hyperthyroidism, Hashimoto's, Graves' disease), blood test interpretation, and treatment options.

Part of the thrive.md health network.

## What We Offer

- **Thyroid function basics** — What the thyroid does, how TSH/T3/T4 work
- **Disorder information** — Hypothyroidism, hyperthyroidism, Hashimoto's, Graves', nodules
- **Blood test interpretation** — TSH, free T4, free T3, thyroid antibodies (TPO, TgAb)
- **Treatment guidance** — Levothyroxine dosing, antithyroid drugs, radioactive iodine, surgery
- **AI-powered Q&A** — Ask questions, get answers sourced from endocrinology research
- **Resources** — Endocrinologist directories, medication guides, thyroid advocacy groups
- **Articles** — Optimal TSH targets, thyroid and pregnancy, subclinical hypothyroidism

## Medical Disclaimer

This site provides medical *information*, not medical *advice*. Thyroid disorders require professional medical diagnosis and treatment. Always consult endocrinologists or healthcare providers for thyroid management decisions.
